title: Apple releases first macOS 12.4 beta [Update: Public beta]
content:
After officially launching its last major release, macOS 12.3, in the middle of March with Universal Control, new emoji, and more, Apple has started up its testing cycle again. The first macOS 12.4 beta is now showing up.

more…

The post Apple releases first macOS 12.4 beta [Update: Public beta] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After officially launching its last major release, macOS 12.3, in the middle of March with Universal Control, new emoji, and more, Apple has started up its testing cycle again. The first macOS 12.4 beta is now showing up. Update 4/6: Apple has now made the first macOS 12.4 beta available to public testers. We’ve also […]
